languages.text: "Крематорий, поди, уже растопил топки, но мне как-то грустно отправлять туда Денза. Он звался Дензом Канистрой и любил, когда враги облиты {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометием{/g} и горят. Будет красиво отправить его в последний путь тем же способом. Благо, канистру прометия на Футфоле достать проще простого".

"I imagine the crematorium has got its furnaces up and running already, but I feel it would be kind of sad to just shove Denz in there like that. He was known as Jerrycan Denz, and he loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned. I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Крематорий, поди, уже растопил топки, но мне как-то грустно отправлять туда Денза. languages.text: “我猜火葬场的炉子已经开始运转了。不过，如果就这样把丹兹塞进去，恐怕就有点太令人难过了。他活着的时候，人们称他为‘油罐’丹兹。他喜欢把他的敌人泡在{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}里烧死。我认为，如果能以同样的方式送他上路，应该算是不错的致敬。好消息是，落脚港这种地方很容易就能买到钷素。”
languages.original_text: "I imagine the crematorium has got its furnaces up and running already, but I feel it would be kind of sad to just shove Denz in there like that. He was known as Jerrycan Denz, and he loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned. I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “我猜火葬场的炉子已经开始运转了。不过，如果就这样把丹兹塞进去，恐怕就有点太令人难过了。他活着的时候，人们称他为‘油罐’丹兹。他喜欢把他的敌人泡在{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}里烧死。我认为，如果能以同样的方式送他上路，应该算是不错的致敬。好消息是，落脚港这种地方很容易就能买到钷素。”

languages.text: «Imagino que el crematorio ya tiene en marcha sus hornos, pero creo que sería un poco triste meter a Denz como si nada. Se ganó el apodo de Denz Bidones porque le encantaba remojar a sus enemigos en {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} antes de quemarlos. Creo que sería un bonito gesto despedirle de la misma forma. Por suerte, conseguir un bidón de prometio en Paso es bien fácil».
languages.original_text: "I imagine the crematorium has got its furnaces up and running already, but I feel it would be kind of sad to just shove Denz in there like that. He was known as Jerrycan Denz, and he loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned. I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «Imagino que el crematorio ya tiene en marcha sus hornos, pero creo que sería un poco triste meter a Denz como si nada. Se ganó el apodo de Denz Bidones porque le encantaba remojar a sus enemigos en {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} antes de quemarlos. Creo que sería un bonito gesto despedirle de la misma forma. Por suerte, conseguir un bidón de prometio en Paso es bien fácil».

languages.text: 「火葬場ではすでに炉が稼働しているでしょうが、デンツをあの中に放り込むのは少々寂しいものがあります。彼は『ジェリカン・デンツ』というあだ名で呼ばれていて、敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}に浸して燃やすのが大好きでした。彼も同じように葬ってあげるのが最後の心遣いというものでしょう。幸いにもフットフォールではジェリカン一杯のプロメチウムが簡単に手に入ります」
languages.original_text: "I imagine the crematorium has got its furnaces up and running already, but I feel it would be kind of sad to just shove Denz in there like that. He was known as Jerrycan Denz, and he loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned. I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「火葬場ではすでに炉が稼働しているでしょうが、デンツをあの中に放り込むのは少々寂しいものがあります。彼は『ジェリカン・デンツ』というあだ名で呼ばれていて、敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}に浸して燃やすのが大好きでした。彼も同じように葬ってあげるのが最後の心遣いというものでしょう。幸いにもフットフォールではジェリカン一杯のプロメチウムが簡単に手に入ります」

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, die Öfen des Krematoriums laufen bereits auf Hochtouren, aber ich fände es irgendwie traurig, Denz einfach so hineinzuschieben. Er war als Kanister Denz bekannt und hat seine Feinde immer mit {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} übergossen und dann angezündet. Ich hielte es für eine schöne Geste, wenn wir ihn genauso auf seinen letzten Weg schicken würden. Zum Glück ist es kein Problem, auf Footfall einen Kanister mit Promethium zu organisieren."
languages.original_text: "I imagine the crematorium has got its furnaces up and running already, but I feel it would be kind of sad to just shove Denz in there like that. He was known as Jerrycan Denz, and he loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned. I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, die Öfen des Krematoriums laufen bereits auf Hochtouren, aber ich fände es irgendwie traurig, Denz einfach so hineinzuschieben. Er war als Kanister Denz bekannt und hat seine Feinde immer mit {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} übergossen und dann angezündet. Ich hielte es für eine schöne Geste, wenn wir ihn genauso auf seinen letzten Weg schicken würden. Zum Glück ist es kein Problem, auf Footfall einen Kanister mit Promethium zu organisieren."

languages.text: « J'imagine que les fours crématoires ont déjà été allumés, mais j'avoue avoir quelques scrupules à jeter Denz dans les flammes comme ça. Après tout, on le surnommait Jerrycan Denz parce qu'il prenait plaisir à arroser ses ennemis de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} avant de leur mettre le feu. Ce serait lui rendre hommage que de l'incinérer de la même manière, surtout qu'il n'est pas bien difficile de se procurer un jerrycan de prométhium à Castel. »
languages.original_text: "I imagine the crematorium has got its furnaces up and running already, but I feel it would be kind of sad to just shove Denz in there like that. He was known as Jerrycan Denz, and he loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned. I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que les fours crématoires ont déjà été allumés, mais j'avoue avoir quelques scrupules à jeter Denz dans les flammes comme ça. Après tout, on le surnommait Jerrycan Denz parce qu'il prenait plaisir à arroser ses ennemis de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} avant de leur mettre le feu. Ce serait lui rendre hommage que de l'incinérer de la même manière, surtout qu'il n'est pas bien difficile de se procurer un jerrycan de prométhium à Castel. »

languages.text: "Krematoryumda şimdiye fırınları harlamışlardır lakin Denz'i oraya öylece sokuvermek beni biraz üzüyor. Kendisi Bidon Denz olarak bilinirdi, düşmanlarını {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyuma{/g} bulayıp yakmaya bayılırdı. Kendisine aynı şekilde veda etmek güzel bir jest olur bence. Neyse ki Binliman'da bidonla prometyum bulmak bayağı kolay."
languages.original_text: "I imagine the crematorium has got its furnaces up and running already, but I feel it would be kind of sad to just shove Denz in there like that. He was known as Jerrycan Denz, and he loved having his enemies drenched in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burned. I think it'd be a nice gesture to send him on his way in the same fashion. Thankfully, it's easy enough to procure a jerrycan of promethium on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Krematoryumun fırınları zaten çalışıyordur, diye tahmin ediyorum ama Denz'i oraya öylece sokuvermek de beni biraz üzüyor. Bidon Denz olarak tanınırdı ve düşmanlarını {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyum{/g}a bulayıp yakmaya bayılırdı. Ona da aynı şekilde veda etmek güzel bir jest olur bence. Neyse ki Binliman'da bir bidon prometyum bulmak oldukça kolay."
